name: Handsome Squid Bakery
description:
Story

Your Grandpa once dreamed of running a great factory in his youth, as his death bed wish, you work to make it a reality.

but starting a bakery is much harder than you thought. 

Details
  • 1920x1080 Resolution.
  • Endless.
  • Pixel Art.
  • Made with Monogame.
Gameplay

You can do most of the stuff with the mouse.

You can Press F11 to toggle full Screen.

press E to cycle throw the possible products, then press the LMB on an empty product line to build it; make sure you can cover the cost.

Contracts are a high paying jobs that you can tackle, press LMB on a contract if you have enough products to deliver it. alternatively you can press RMB to rotate it into a fresh contract.

with such a large factory at hand, Bills are a must, you need to pay them within the time. too many unpaid Bills and the bank will seize your whole factory!

All of your Product lines can be upgraded each game using scraps you collect throw-out the game. press on the Upgrade button to open the Upgrade menu.

You have free control over your store selling your produced goods, if you click it with LMB to OPEN it will sell you items generating cash and scrap, while your items will stay in storage if it's CLOSED.
